title: T3PR00T
author: T3PR00T
content: QuoteThe grue lurks in the darkest places of the earth. Its favorite diet is adventurers, but its insatiable appetite is tempered by its fear of light. No grue has ever been seen by the light of day, and few have survived its fearsome jaws to tell the tale. Interesting forum Factoid. I discover it on the forum ad space.A grue is a fictional, predatory creature but how it's related to Bitcoin and it's community?

comments.author: imamusma
comments.body: It's a little hard to explain, but would you also ask what correlation between emoticon and bitcoin?This is one of the unique factoid slots, isn't it?Quote

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: You can go through the full list of factoids[1]. Some were chosen by VIPs/Donators according to theymos, so they could have no relationship to bitcoin, just an idea or idiosyncrasy they have.Quote from: theymos on March 21, 2018, 07:21:49 PMA few of them look like ads, or seem out of place - those are free factoids that Donators/VIPs get. Factoids are not normally supposed to look like ads....- A random forum user reading a random factoid should have a good chance of thinking that it was interesting, funny, or useful.I never knew about Greus, so it could pass off as interesting.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/adrotate.php?adinfo- Jay -

comments.author: Halab
comments.body: Quote from: T3PR00T on March 30, 2023, 06:11:57 PMA grue is a fictional, predatory creature but how it's related to Bitcoin and it's community?Probably because of this user.An ex-GM, who made useful little scripts. And his signature looks like the factoid.
